metadata.title: Men's Plaid Design Dress Vest & BOWTie Black Turquoise White BOW Tie Set
features: Mens Plaid Design Dress Vest with Bow Tie of the Same Pattern and Color and Made From The Same Material For a Perfect Match.

Available in sizes: XS (Chest Size: 36), S (Chest Size: 38), M (Chest Size: 40), L (Chest Size: 42) , XL (Chest Size: 44), 2XL (Chest Size: 47), 3XL (Chest Size: 50), 4XL (Chest Size: 53), 5XL (Chest Size: 58), and 6XL (Chest Size: 62).
Full Back Vest with belted adjustable back for a perfect fit.
Great to wear with a suit or tuxedo
description: Brand New Vesuvio Napoli Brand Plaid Vest and BowTie Set.
